################################################## # # DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE # # Create a new .htaccess file in your htdocs # directory (or example.com/htdocs/ directory) # to add your own rules or override these rules. # ################################################## DirectoryIndex index.php index.html index.htm index2.html # Force HTTPS RewriteEngine On RewriteCond %{HTTPS} !=on RewriteRule ^(.*)$ https://%{HTTP_HOST}%{REQUEST_URI} [L,R=301] ErrorDocument 404 /404.html ErrorDocument 403 /403.html ErrorDocument 500 /500.html # Disable caching completely (force full reload on every refresh) Header set Cache-Control "no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate" Header set Pragma "no-cache" Header set Expires 0
